description:
Most people don't know that when they get a vaccine injection for a virus, they're being injected with the virus itself. The vaccine contains the same virus that you're protecting yourself against. Therefore, if you are already vaccinated, you already have the virus and no one can infect you with it, you idiot! You are the danger against those who are not yet vaccinated, not vice versa. To hide now like a coward from COVID19, but stand in line a few months from now to let them inject you with it is beyond stupid. Look at the Amish community of America, for example, who generally don't vaccinate their children. How come they didn't get viral outbreaks? It's a hoax that's why. But again, the dumbed-down sheeple are too hopeless to question anything. They don't think, they simply follow. No wonder the banking elites who own and control all major social media platforms adopted the terminology ""followers."" #Vaccines #Vaccine #ForcedVaccination #Vaccination #Sheeple #COVID19 #COVID19Vaccine #Virus #Followers #QuestionEverything #Plandemic #ID2020 #MarkOfTheBeast #DigitalID #UNICEF #WHO #MedicalMartialLaw #MedicalMartialLaw2020 #MartialLaw #MartialLaw2020 #BillGates #Event201 #GlobalHealthSecurityAgenda #NWO #NewWorldOrder #COVID19 #COVID19Bioweapon #Coronavirus #COVID19Lockdown
